testcase.name: TC_01 Login ,Create and Delete the employee List on the EaapSomee Application
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to eaapSomee Application.....................................passed Then Login as admin.........................................................passed And Go to Employee List page................................................passed Then Create a new employee..................................................passed And Verify the new employee info in Employee List page......................passed Then Delete the new employee................................................passed Then Verify the new employee deleted in Employee List page..................passed
